popt4jlib.neural

Class Linear

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.neural.Linear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, NNNodeIntf, OutputNNNodeIntf

    public class Linear
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputNNNodeIntf
    Linear implements the linear activation function, and can be used as hidden layer node or as output node.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Linear()
      public no-arg no-op constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double eval(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights)
      Given arguments two vectors x and y, returns the inner product <x,y>.
      double eval(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights, int offset)
      same as eval(s,w) method, but the 2nd argument is now assumed to hold all the network weights.
      double eval(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights, int offset, double true_label)
      called when the node is used as output node, simply calls eval(inputSignals,weights,offset).
      double evalB(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights)
      Given arguments two vectors x and y, returns <x,y[0:x.len-1]>+y[y.len-1].
      double evalB(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights, int offset)
      same as evalB(s,w) method, but the 2nd argument is now assumed to hold all the network weights plus the nodes' biases.
      double evalB(double[] inputSignals, double[] weights, int offset, double true_label)
      called when the node is used as output node, simply calls evalB(inputSignals,weights,offset).
      java.lang.String getNodeName()
      get this node's name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
